official-title.#text:
To require a report and briefing to Congress explaining the procurement and inspection process for
			 armored vehicles to transport civilian employees of the Department of
			 Defense.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Report and briefing to Congress explaining the procurement and inspection process for armored

text.#text: It is the sense of Congress that—

should employ stringent, uniform standards
			 while procuring armored vehicles for civilians to be used overseas as well
			 as stringent standards for inspection upon delivery.
